timeline.message: Add StreamGithubEventsCommand to decouple streaming events into topic from rest of the process (setting up cluster, setting up kafka, creating topic and adding table)
DefaultNullValue of dimensions to empty string

timeline.bodyText: /tmp --> System.gettemp dir or something like that
